Articles.Content: Does anyone have any good starship replicas that actually work? And that uses the big parts from making history and the actuating components from breaking ground also I don’t like the fairing trick people do as I definitely want to place a near future cargo bay on it so I can lift space station modules on it during career mode. I’m sorta looking for a good craft file like this yes and I know I don’t need but I want one for career mode also want this to help minimize frame hiccups while video recording.

https://kerbalx.com/Yukon0009/SpaceX-Lunar-Starship-2021

Dude there are dozens of starships out there for KSP if they dont meet your needs use them as inspiration to make your own.

Yukon009's I think has the best one. It's just Awesome worked first go.
